bill.title: An Act Concerning Increased Opportunities For Absentee Voting, Safe And Secure In-person Voting, Voter Registration And Certain Other Changes Regarding Election Administration.
bill.description: To make several changes to election laws designed to increase opportunities for absentee voting, safe and secure in-person voting and voter registration.
